revised_title: Investigating Cerebro-Cortical Afferent and Efferent Tracts
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on the visual and auditory systems to understand the tracts by which sensory impressions reach the brain's cortex. They studied the effects of lesions on the brain and observed the resulting degenerations. The research aimed to clarify the cortical areas associated with different senses and the connections between the brain and sensory organs.
